content: The FHIR WGM Agenda (all known sessions dealing with FHIR-related content) for the May 2019 WGM can be found here: http://bit.ly/FHIR201905. If you have edits/corrections, please make them directly if you have wiki access or send me a PM.

informal evening schedule:

  • Tues - short session on V2 -> FHIR mapping
  • Wed - FHIR Mapping Language, More work on IG Template
  • Thurs - no meeting

These are deep technical working discussions. If you are interested in joining them, talk to me or one of the FHIR-I co-chairs
Hi, I am interested in joining these discussions.

Discussion should be on implementers. (Though in this case, the working group meeting was last week so the discussions are now done. If you'll be in Atlanta for the next WGM, expect a similar notification at the beginning of that week.)
